title: RCMP, fire department are investigating cause of blaze
source_url: file://imports/Burns Lake Lakes District News Burns Lake Lakes District News 08_06_2025 1.pdf
excerpt: The Dollar Store in Burns Lake caught fire some time during the evening of July 29 or the morning of July 30. No injuries were reported, although there was significant damage to the Dollar Store and a
content_html: The Dollar Store in Burns Lake caught fire some time during the evening of July 29 or the morning of July 30. No injuries were reported, although there was significant damage to the Dollar Store and a neighbouring business, Burns Lake Fire Chief Robert Krause said in an email. The fire was first reported to the fire department at 3:29 a.m. July 30. As firefighters arrived on scene, they observed smoke coming from the back of the building. 13 members of the fire department responded and the fire was under control by 5:15 a.m., Krause said. The fire department and RCMP are investigating the cause of the fire.
